laazotea.indi.driver.examples

Class INDIElTiempoDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIDriver
      • laazotea.indi.driver.examples.INDIElTiempoDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, INDIConnectionHandler, laazotea.indi.INDIProtocolParser

    public class INDIElTiempoDriver
extends INDIDriver
implements java.lang.Runnable, INDIConnectionHandler
    A small example Driver that uses the INDI for Java Driver library. It defines two BLOB Properties, two Text Properties and a Switch One. The BLOB Properties will have two images about the weather in Spain and Europe (dinamically downloaded from http://eltiempo.es), and the Text ones will contain the names of them. It will check for updated images every 15 minutes. The Switch Property can be used to ask for the current images (for example once the client connects to the driver).
    Version:
    1.3, April 5, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
